Function: method used for the decripting of the passwords written on the databases.
passwordError(String) - Method in exception IO.passwordException
Function: it's used to generate an exception and repeat the process of input of the password until the syntax of that is correct.
passwordException - Exception in IO
This class manage the exception that could be created with the insertion of a wrong password, that doesn't respect the rules of syntax.
passwordException() - Constructor for exception IO.passwordException
Constructor: it creates exception of 'passwordException' type.
passwordSyntaxCheck(String) - Static method in class IO.getInputFromKeyboard
Function: it's used to check the syntax of a mail, with a default pattern: 1.)
passwordValidation(String) - Method in class IO.getInputFromKeyboard
Function: it's used to validate a password in case of a correct syntax, creating an exception instead.
